en.title: FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner, 15th November 2008 (1)
en.content:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at Malaysian Argo Expo Park (MAEPS), Serdang, Selangor, was a GREAT GREAT SUCCESS with around 2,000 attendees! It was a GRAND event with FE Leaders, Members, VIPs and guests from many countries including from Thailand, Philippines, Indonesia, Singapore, Australia, South Africa, UK, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Oman, Sri Lanka, Myanmar, Vietnam, China, etc.

Highlights Of The Event Include:
 
- Performance and exhibition by 18 Karate Exponents from Isshin Budokan Karate International. Grand Master Ricky Wong, Founder of Isshin Budokan Karate is a QP Wearer. You can read his fantastic testimonial at FE's Testimonial page.
 
- Opening Speech by Founder Director, KS Lee.
 
- Product Demo by Presidential Director, KC Phoon. As usual, the crowd was amazed by the power of FE's Quantum Pendant, especially when the Lifting Demo was performed! Thank you, KC!
 
- Presentation and Demo by FE Spokesman, International Long Drive Golf Specialist, Jean Daniels. Jean's demonstration of hitting a golf ball through a wooden board on the stage was truly IMPRESSIVE! Jean also gave a summary of FE's successful Long Drive Golf Challenge held recently. The Men's and Ladies National Long Drive records were broken at the event by George Cheah (356.7 yards) and Cindy Koh (260.2 yards). The Winner and Runner Up of the Long Drive Challenge were also announced, Mohd Rizam Ali (RM 20,000.) and Mohd Hanafiah Jamil (RM 10,000). FE looks forward to the next Long Drive Golf Challenge. Thank you, Jean, for your tireless effort to promote Long Drive golf in this part of the world!
 
- Speech by FE Presidential Director from Philippines, Pastor Arthur Medina on the "Christmas For Payatas" Charity Appeal. When the videos on "Christmas For Payatas" were played, there were no dry eyes in the audience. There was an appearance by Mary Rose, 14 years old scavenger from Payatas, whose life is now changed forever, for the better, because of FE's effort to help the less fortunate of society. A total of RM 214,246.40 was raised on the night. FE would like to thank all those who donated especially PDs Jeremy Looi, who is also the Country Licensee of Philippines (RM 25,000), KC Phoon (RM 10,000), Rachel Thomas (RM 10,000), Don Chan, Thai Country Licensee (RM 10,000), Jankij from Thailand (RM 10,000). FE is so proud that FE's culture of HELPING and CARING for the less fortunate of society is now being practiced by FE Members! The "Christmas For Payatas" Appeal continues until Christmas Day 2008. For those FE members who have not donated, please do so GENEROUSLY. You can also help by passing the word around to all your friends. Tell them to watch the videos on YouTube! Together we can BURY POVERTY! AHOOO!
 
- Launching of luxury MOUAWAD Healthy Jewellery by Malaysian Celebrities and Actresses, Zoee Tan, Emily Lim, Aenie Wong and Novel Lim. Zoee, Emily, Aenie and Novel were the stars of FE sponsored Telemovie "Legacy of a Lost Love". MOUAWAD's Licensee for Asia, Mr Antoine Bakhache attended the launch. FE is proud to be associated with World Class Jeweller MOUAWAD to bring FE's Quantum Pendant to the upper echelons of society around the world! For more info on the background of MOUAWAD, please visit their website www.mouawad.com.
 
- Speech by FE Thai Country Licensee, Don Chan. Thank you Don for sharing the good news from Thailand!
 
- Presentation of Cheque to FE sponsored Chef, Sheva Kumar on winning the Gold Medal at the 6th World Championship Chinese Cuisine in Beijing. Accompanying Sheva on the stage was Master Chef Ringo Kaw who was the leader of the Malaysian Team at the World Championships. Congratulations!
 
- Installation of new Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors.
 
- Speeches by new Presidential Directors.
 
- Motivation Sharing by Presidential Director, Rachel Thomas who inspired the audience by her powerful presentation! We salute you, Rachel!
 
- Closing Speech by Presidential Director, KC Phoon! As usual KC did a great job delivering his success story to the audience. AHOOO KC!
 
- Lucky Draws and Good Night until we meet AGAIN! Thank you to MCs, Lovey Lee and Vincent Wong for a great job!
 
<< Click Here For More Photos >>

FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at Malaysian Argo Expo Park (MAEPS), Serdang, Selangor, was a GREAT GREAT SUCCESS with around 2,000 attendees! It was a GRAND event with FE Leaders, Members, VIPs and guests from many countries including from Thailand, Philippines, Indonesia, Singapore, Australia, South Africa, UK, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Oman, Sri Lanka, Myanmar, Vietnam, China, etc.

- Performance and exhibition by 18 Karate Exponents from Isshin Budokan Karate International. Grand Master Ricky Wong, Founder of Isshin Budokan Karate is a QP Wearer. You can read his fantastic testimonial at FE's Testimonial page.
- Opening Speech by Founder Director, KS Lee.
- Product Demo by Presidential Director, KC Phoon. As usual, the crowd was amazed by the power of FE's Quantum Pendant, especially when the Lifting Demo was performed! Thank you, KC!
- Presentation and Demo by FE Spokesman, International Long Drive Golf Specialist, Jean Daniels. Jean's demonstration of hitting a golf ball through a wooden board on the stage was truly IMPRESSIVE! Jean also gave a summary of FE's successful Long Drive Golf Challenge held recently. The Men's and Ladies National Long Drive records were broken at the event by George Cheah (356.7 yards) and Cindy Koh (260.2 yards). The Winner and Runner Up of the Long Drive Challenge were also announced, Mohd Rizam Ali (RM 20,000.) and Mohd Hanafiah Jamil (RM 10,000). FE looks forward to the next Long Drive Golf Challenge. Thank you, Jean, for your tireless effort to promote Long Drive golf in this part of the world!
- Speech by FE Presidential Director from Philippines, Pastor Arthur Medina on the "Christmas For Payatas" Charity Appeal. When the videos on "Christmas For Payatas" were played, there were no dry eyes in the audience. There was an appearance by Mary Rose, 14 years old scavenger from Payatas, whose life is now changed forever, for the better, because of FE's effort to help the less fortunates of society. For those FE members who have not donated, please do so GENEROUSLY. You can also help by passing the word around to all your friends. Tell them to watch the videos on YouTube! Together we can BURY POVERTY! AHOOO!

Zoee, Emily, Aenie and Novel were the stars of FE sponsored Telemovie "Legacy of a Lost Love". MOUAWAD's Licensee for Asia, Mr Antoine Bakhache attended the launch. FE is proud to be associated with World Class Jeweller MOUAWAD to bring FE's Quantum Pendant to the upper echelons of society around the world! For more info on the background of MOUAWAD, please visit their website www.mouawad.com.
- Speech by FE Thai Country Lincensee, Don Chan. Thank you Don for sharing the good news from Thailand!
- Presentation of Cheque to FE sponsored Chef, Sheva Kumar on winning the Gold Medal at the 6th World Championship Chinese Cuisine in Beijing. Accompanying Sheva on the stage was Master Chef Ringo Kaw who was the leader of the Malaysian Team at the World Championships. Congratulations!
- Installation of new Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors.
- Speeches by new Presidential Directors.
- Motivation Sharing by Presidential Director, Rachel Thomas who inspired the audience by her powerful presentation! We salute you, Rachel!
- Closing Speech by Presidential Director, KC Phoon! As usual KC did a great job delivering his success story to the audience. AHOOO KC!
- Lucky Draws and Good Night until we meet AGAIN! Thank you to MCs, Lovey Lee and Vincent Wong for a great job!
meta.author: klhunter
